title: friend cant login to account @riot
body: my friend --snip-- cant login too his account and the email for password retrieval is not sending can you just give him some help

replies.body: Have your friend restart his client just in case his patcher hasn't updated him yet.  If he still runs into issues, have him hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team will help.  I've also removed your friend's name for privacy reasons.  I hope that helps!
